name: Blipblorp the Blob in Escape from the Absurdist Hellscape
name_original: Blipblorp the Blob in Escape from the Absurdist Hellscape
description:
Blipblorp the Blob makes his triumphant return in a game jam game!

Blipblorp receives another assassination mission, but things go bad when his target sucks him into an absurdist painting! As the artist continues to work on his painting, Blipblorp gains strange, new power-ups. However, Blipblorp isn't the only one gaining these abilities. The very world itself gains these powers as well. Will Blipblorp be able to escape this artist's absurdist hellscape? Well, I mean, you could find out by playing the game. Which you should.

Oh also I forgot to put this somewhere in the game but pressing the "O" key acts as a close window button. Also the game does not save because I did not have time to implement that so pressing "2" or "3" on the main menu will jump you to levels 2 and 3, respectively.

Oh also also follow @thebareminimumstudios on instagram right NOW
